original_text: So I told you what the Lord had said, but you would not agree. Instead, you turned against the Lord. You were so proud that you marched up into the hill country.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하였으나 너희가 듣지 아니하고 여호와의 명령을 거역하고 거리낌 없이 산지로 올라가매

sentences.original_text: So I told you what the Lord had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 주님께서 하신 말씀을 너희에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: Instead, you turned against the Lord
that you marched up into the hill country
